message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"to be angry; to get angry","sentence":"他生气。","image_prompt":"A cartoonish scene in soft apocalypse animation style: a boy with an upset face, fists slightly clenched, red cheeks, and steam coming out of his head to show anger. The background is softly surreal—a broken city street with pastel ruins, but the mood is not threatening. The boy is at the center, visually expressing anger in a gentle, animated way.","sentence_translation":"He is angry."}
